name: Cannon Fire
description: Cannon fire is a game all about blowing your friends' ship to pieces, in Multiplayer or Split-Screen mode for the best experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win xp or higher Processor: i5 3th gen Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GForce 300 series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win xp or higher Processor: i5 3th gen Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GForce 300 series DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
